original_text: Portions were taken to them from Joseph's table, but Benjamin's portion was five times as much as any of theirs. And they drank and were merry with him.
korean_text: 요셉이 자기 음식을 그들에게 주되 베냐민에게는 다른 사람보다 다섯 배나 주매 그들이 마시며 요셉과 함께 즐거워하였더라

sentences.original_text: Portions were taken to them from Joseph's table
but Benjamin's portion was five times as much as any of theirs
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 베냐민의 몫은 그들 중 누구의 것보다 다섯 배나 더 많았습니다
